Method Detail

stripGetterPrefix

public static String stripGetterPrefix(String name)
Remove the getter prefix ('is', 'get') from the the method name passed in.

Parameters:
name - the method name.
Returns:
the method name without the prefix, may be null or empty if the name passed in was that way.

getGetterField

public static Field getGetterField(Method method)
Find the field for the getter method based on the get methods name. It finds the field on the declaring class.

Parameters:
method - cannot be null.
Returns:
the field or null if not found.

getExposedFieldInfo

public static List<ReflectedInfo> getExposedFieldInfo(Class<?> clazz)
Retrieve all fields deemed as Exposed, i.e. they are public or have a public accessor method or are marked by an annotation to be exposed.

Parameters:
obj - cannot be null.
Returns:

getTokenKeys

public static Set<String> getTokenKeys(String str)
Retrieve all token keys from a string. A token is found by its its start and end delimiters which are open and close curly braces.

Parameters:
str - the string to parse, may be null or empty.
Returns:
the set of unique token keys. Never null.May be empty.

getFieldValue

public static Object getFieldValue(Field field,
                                   Object obj)
Convenience method to retrieve the field value for the specified object wrapped to catch exceptions and re throw as Siren4JRuntimeException.

Parameters:
field - cannot be null.
obj - may be null.
Returns:
the value, may be null.

getFieldInfoByEffectiveName

public static ReflectedInfo getFieldInfoByEffectiveName(List<ReflectedInfo> infoList,
                                                        String name)
Helper method to find the field info by its effective name from the passed in list of info.

Parameters:
infoList - cannot be null.
name - cannot be null or empty.
Returns:
the info or null if not found.

setFieldValue

public static void setFieldValue(Object obj,
                                 ReflectedInfo info,
                                 Object value)
                          throws Siren4JException
Sets the fields value, first by attempting to call the setter method if it exists and then falling back to setting the field directly.

Parameters:
obj - the object instance to set the value on, cannot be null.
info - the fields reflected info object, cannot be null.
value - the value to set on the field, may be null.
Throws:
Siren4JException - upon reflection error.
